tool_description: Nurse verification is used to verify whether an individual is a registered nurse with the Indian Nurse Council (INC). This tool helps ensure that nursing professionals meet the required standards and are officially recognized.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetches the results of the nurse verification process using the request ID received in the initial response.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the verification request.

api_list.name: Nurse Verification
api_list.description: Initiates the nurse verification process to check if an individual is a registered nurse with the Indian Nurse Council (INC).
